amendment.description: Manager's amendment consisting of amendments numbered 1, 6, 7, 8, as modified, 9, 12, 15, 18, 21, 22, and 24 printed in House Report 112-138, offered en bloc and which appear on page H4895 of the Congressional Record for July 12, 2011.
amendment.purpose: An En Bloc amendment consisting of amendments numbered 1, 6, 7, 8, as modified, 9, 12, 15, 18, 21, 22, and 24 to make technical and sundry changes to the bill.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A001) offered by Mrs. Biggert.
On agreeing to the Biggert amendments (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
